name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of extensive experience in developing distributed systems and designing RESTful APIs. Proficient in **PHP**, **Laravel**, **Symfony**, and adept at implementing **event-driven architecture** and **messaging systems**. Skilled in both SQL and NoSQL databases while applying caching strategies to enhance application performance.
Demonstrated knowledge of **AWS** for cloud deployment and monitoring, utilizing **Datadog** and **Prometheus** for system observability. Strong advocate for OOP, following SOLID principles and design patterns to create scalable and maintainable backend solutions.
Experienced in transitioning services to **microservices** architecture and comfortable with SaaS and PaaS models. Additionally, I possess a robust foundation in the healthcare and financial sectors, having developed AI/ML-powered platforms capable of predictive analytics and real-time processing.
